DOC.brief_summary: This study characterize subject-rated behavioral effect salvinorin A healthy volunteer . The investigator hypothesize salvinorin A hallucinogen-like effect .
DOC.criteria: Have give write informed consent Have high school level education Have selfreported interest spirituality alter state consciousness Have use hallucinogen ( e.g. , LSD , psilocybin mushroom , Salvia divinorum ) include use Salvia divinorum salvinorin A inhalation route ( i.e. , volunteer without history Salvia divinorum salvinorin A use inhalation route exclude ) Be 21 65 year old Agree consume approximately amount caffeinecontaining beverage ( e.g. , coffee , tea ) he/she consume usual morning , arrive research unit morning drug session day . If volunteer routinely consume caffeinated beverage , must agree session day . Agree refrain use psychoactive drug , include alcoholic beverage , within 24 hour drug administration . As described elsewhere , exception include daily use caffeine . Be healthy determine screen medical problem via personal interview , medical questionnaire , physical examination , electrocarroutine medical blood urinalysis laboratory test . General Medical Exclusion Criteria Cardiovascular condition : uncontrolled hypertension , angina , clinically significant ECG abnormality ( e.g . atrial fibrillation ) , TIA last 6 month stroke , peripheral pulmonary vascular disease Epilepsy history seizure Diabetes mellitus Females pregnant ( positive pregnancy test ) nursing , practice effective mean birth control Currently take psychoactive prescription medication regular basis More 20 % outside upper low range ideal body weight accord Metropolitan Life height weight table Psychiatric Exclusion Criteria Current past history meeting DSMIV criterion Schizophrenia , Psychotic Disorder ( unless substanceinduced due medical condition ) , Bipolar I II Disorder . Current severe ObsessiveCompulsive Disorder , Dysthymic Disorder , Panic Disorder . Current past history within last 5 year meet DSMIV criterion alcohol drug dependence ( exclude caffeine nicotine ) severe major depression . Have first second degree relative schizophrenia , psychotic disorder ( unless substance induce due medical condition ) , bipolar I II disorder . Currently meet DSMIV criterion Dissociative Disorder , Anorexia Nervosa , Bulimia Nervosa , psychiatric condition judge incompatible establishment rapport safe exposure salvinorin A .
DOC.keyword: Healthy volunteer study evaluate subject-rated , behavioral , abuse liability effect salvinorin A
